title: Failed to produce block - Invalid list length 8 over limit 2

labels.name: meta-bug
labels.description: Issues that identify a bug and require a fix.

body:
### Describe the bug

When setting up dev network and do self attester slashing to a lot of validators, I got this error when producing block at `vc` side

```
Nov-28 07:04:59.037[]                ^[[31merror^[[39m: Error proposing block slot=826, validator=0xae24â€¦089e - Invalid list length 8 over limit 2 - Failed to produce block
Error: Invalid list length 8 over limit 2 - Failed to produce block
    at assertValidArrayLength (/usr/src/lodestar/node_modules/@chainsafe/ssz/src/type/arrayBasic.ts:239:13)
    at Object.value_fromJsonArray (/usr/src/lodestar/node_modules/@chainsafe/ssz/src/type/arrayBasic.ts:153:3)
    at ListCompositeType.fromJson (/usr/src/lodestar/node_modules/@chainsafe/ssz/src/type/array.ts:120:12)
    at ContainerType.fromJson (/usr/src/lodestar/node_modules/@chainsafe/ssz/src/type/container.ts:349:36)
    at ContainerType.fromJson (/usr/src/lodestar/node_modules/@chainsafe/ssz/src/type/container.ts:349:36)
    at Object.fromJson (file:///usr/src/lodestar/packages/api/src/utils/types.ts:156:44)
    at Object.fromJson (file:///usr/src/lodestar/packages/api/src/utils/types.ts:193:15)
    at Object.request [as produceBlockV2] (file:///usr/src/lodestar/packages/api/src/utils/client/client.ts:71:50)
    at processTicksAndRejections (node:internal/process/task_queues:95:5)
    at BlockProposingService.produceBlockV2Wrapper (file:///usr/src/lodestar/packages/validator/src/services/block.ts:238:19)
```

and node is out of sync since then because there are too many AttesterSlashings in the op pool and `bc` keeps producing invalid blocks

### Expected behavior

No error

### Steps to reproduce

_No response_

### Additional context

_No response_

### Operating system

Linux

### Lodestar version or commit hash

unstable
